column4: OMG, seriously... does no one know of a way to play FLV files on Ubuntu?! VLC works on OS X.... not on Ubuntu.
to play .flv files you need the proprietary flash plugin;
Do you have flash plugin in firefox installed
oh okay! how do i get it?
go to add/remove software and install the firefox flash plugin from there, if you are a n00b
good now open firefox, and go to "about:plugins" (put it in address bar) Do you see the flash plugin there?
you installed flash and re-started firefox?
Go to firefox>open and select your .flv file and see if it plays in firefox
search the forums, its got a nice tutorial there
